鸒鸒鸒

鸒字的基本解释

鸒
yù
寒鸦：“弁彼鸒斯，归飞提提。”

鸒字的汉语字典释义

[①]［yù］
［《廣韻》羊洳切，去御，以。］
［《廣韻》以諸切，平魚，以。］
鸟名。参见“鸒斯”。

鸒字的康熙字典解释

【亥集中】【鳥字部】　鸒； 康熙笔画：25； 页码：页1503第34
【廣韻】以諸切【集韻】【韻會】羊諸切【正韻】雲居切，?音余。【說文】?居也。一名鴉烏。小而多羣，腹下白。【詩·小雅】弁彼鸒斯。【字彙】斯，語辭，後儒以二字爲鳥名，非。又【唐韻】【集韻】【韻會】【正韻】?羊茹切，音豫。義同。【說文】作?。

鸒字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
鸒字的起名意思

暂无。

Lu
Basic explanation of words
Lu
yù
Jackdaw: "Benpi Yasi, go to Feititi."
Lu
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［yù］
["Guangyun" sheep cut, go to imperial, take. ]
["Guangyun" is based on all cuts, flat fish, with. ]
The name of the bird. See "Earth".
Lu
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Hai Collection] [Bird Character Department] 　鸒; Kangxi Strokes: 25; Page Number: Page 1503 Page 34
[Guang Yun] Zhu Qi [Ji Yun] [Yun Hui] Sheep Zhu Qi [Zheng Yun] Yunju Qi,? Yin Yu. [Said the text]? Ju also. A crow. Small but many groups, white under the abdomen. 【Poetry·Xiaoya】Ben Bi Yasi. [Vocabulary] Si, diction, post-Confucianism with two characters as the bird name, non. Also [Tang Yun] [Ji Yun] [Rhyme Meeting] [Zheng Yun]? Yang Ru cut, Yin Yu. The same meaning. [Said the text] For?.
